suggest.ext-http: Needed for HTTP support in Corona, needed to get hostname in Shadow when parsing data
suggest.ext-apn: Needed for push notification support in Vortex with PHP 5
suggest.ext-msgpack: Needed for msgpack support in Corona
suggest.ext-gettext: Needed for internationalization support in L10n
suggest.ext-mysqli: Needed for MySQL/MariaDB support in Gravity (0.1)
suggest.ext-mysqlnd_ms: Needed for MySQL load balancing Gravity (r335219) -> https://svn.php.net/viewvc/pecl/mysqlnd_ms/trunk/
suggest.ext-uopz: Needed for unit tests on PHP 7 to mock internals
suggest.ext-runkit: Needed for unit tests on PHP 5 to mock internals
